product_name: Serengeti Chloe Photochromic Sunglasses - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Serengeti Chloe photochromic sunglasses polish off your look with a touch of glamor and high-performance technology that cuts glare and automatically adjusts shading for optimal coverage. Photochromic technology adjusts to variations in UV light, providing light or dark tinting depending on brightness levels. Lightweight, durable nylon frames are built to withstand everyday use. Closeout.
short_description: The Serengeti Chloe photochromic sunglasses polish off your look with a touch of glamor and high-performance technology that cuts glare and automatically adjusts shading for optimal coverage.
